title: About Me
text:
My research goal is to be an expert in controlled and semi-controlled environments agriculture.



I received my Bachelor of Science in Agriculture (Hons.) and Master of Science in Agronomy from the Bangladesh Agricultural University (BAU).



I have more than 6 years of research experience in Soil Science and Agronomy.
Thanks for checking out my web site!
